message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Its value speaks for itself, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,800,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a competitive price. While your offer is appreciated,  the value this product represents is truly unique.  I can meet you halfway from my previous offer at $1,600,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking for a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,500,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
